Question: During victory check, may the owner of Golden Statue spend 3 Gold to gain 3 temporary points even after passing?
Rationale: Golden Statue’s React may always be used when checking victory.:contentReference[oaicite:34]{index=34}:contentReference[oaicite:35]{index=35}
game_state_description: Golden Statue face‑up; player pools 3 Gold.
